attributes.action: Give Individual Councils the monies from speed camera/traffic fines to increase the size of there local police force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: seems our overpayed taxes cannot fund the police force to the numbers we require to keep up with the ever growing crimes in this country no matter what the goverment statistics say about crime reducing. the real fact is we know we wont see the police for sometimes weeks after a crime is committed, so the majority of small crimes are not reported as the general public see's no point.. so we should fund more policing from all the fines paid from traffic offences.
